Articles.Content:
Hello,

I\'m 26 years old and I\'m living in Germany. Yesterday I discovered this game and two hours ago I purchased it. I played with the demo and I think this game has a lot of potential. So I decided to follow its development and I hope this experience will be as good as the one I have made with minecraft. When I was younger I was interested in Astronomy and Planets and today it is still fascinating.

So I\'m looking forward to see how this game will grow and what will be possible.

Welcome to the forums, enjoy your stay!

-Mincespy

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
